universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface Pullable.Pull

  • Enclosing interface:
    Pullable

    public static interface Pullable.Pull
    A layer that provides access to current pull data.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean collapse()
      Collapses the current pull via animation.
      float getPosition()
      Returns a position of the current pull.
      float getPullOverflowPosition()
      Returns a position of the current pull overflow.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        float getPosition()
        Returns a position of the current pull. This can be either positive or negative value.

        Positive position indicates pull at the start, negative indicates pull at the end of the pullable view.

        Returns:
        Pull position from the range [0, 1] or [-1, 0].

      • getPullOverflowPosition

        float getPullOverflowPosition()
        Returns a position of the current pull overflow. This can be also either positive or negative value (see getPosition() for info).

        Sum of the position + overflow position results into total pull position.

        Returns:
        Pull overflow position from the range

      • collapse

        boolean collapse()
        Collapses the current pull via animation.
        Returns:
        True if collapse animation has been started, false if it is already running.
